entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Highvale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
